logger.message: CRITICAL/EMERGENCY alert - triggering multi-agency coordination for facility #[vars.facilityId]
logger.doc:name: Log Emergency Coordination

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: "Alert: " ++ payload.alertLevel ++ " - " ++ payload.emergencyType ++ ". Risk Score: " ++ (payload.environmentalRiskScore as String) ++ ". Affected Population: " ++ (payload.affectedPopulation as String) ++ ". Immediate coordination required."

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- vars.alertResponse ++ { slotifyIntegration: { status: payload.status, meetingId: payload.meetingId, meetingUrl: payload.meetingUrl, videoConferenceUrl: payload.videoConferenceUrl, scheduledTime: payload.scheduledTime, room: payload.room, participantsNotified: payload.participantsNotified, message: payload.message } }

logger.message: Slotify integration failed, continuing with alert creation: #[error.description]
logger.doc:name: Log Slotify Failure

logger.message: Warning alert created - standard monitoring protocols apply
logger.doc:name: Log Standard Alert
